languages.text: "Да, это очень печально. Мне бы хотелось увидеть Футфол таким, каким его задумывал создатель".
"That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."
languages.original_text: "Да, это очень печально. Мне бы хотелось увидеть Футфол таким, каким его задумывал создатель".

traits.locale_text: "Tragic, it's true. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."

languages.text: 「それは確かに悲惨だ。私も創設者が描いた姿のフットフォールを見てみたい」
languages.original_text: "That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."

traits.locale_text: 「それは確かに悲惨だ。私も創設者が描いた姿のフットフォールを見てみたい」

languages.text: “这确实是个悲剧，我真希望能亲眼看到落脚港的创始人所设想的样子。”
languages.original_text: "That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."

traits.locale_text: “这确实是个悲剧，我真希望能亲眼看到落脚港的创始人所设想的样子。”

languages.text: «Trágico, cuando menos. Ojalá pudiera ver Paso según la visión de su creador».
languages.original_text: "That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."

traits.locale_text: «Trágico, cuando menos. Ojalá pudiera ver Paso según la visión de su creador».

languages.text: « C'est tragique, en effet. J'aurais aimé voir Castel comme son créateur l'avait imaginé. »
languages.original_text: "That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tragique, en effet. J'aurais aimé voir Castel comme son créateur l'avait imaginé. »

languages.text: "Das ist in der Tat tragisch. Ich wünschte, ich könnte Footfall so sehen, wie sein Schöpfer es sich vorgestellt hat."
languages.original_text: "That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist in der Tat tragisch. Ich wünschte, ich könnte Footfall so sehen, wie sein Schöpfer es sich vorgestellt hat."

languages.text: "Gerçekten de trajikmiş. Keşke Binliman'ı, kurucusunun hayal ettiği şekilde görebilseydim."
languages.original_text: "That is tragic indeed. I wish I could see Footfall the way its creator envisioned it."
